title: TurboScan document scanner v1.3.0.apk
description:
TurboScan turns your phone into a multipage scanner for documents, receipts, notes, whiteboards, and other text. With TurboScan, you can quickly scan your documents and store or email them as multipage PDF or JPEG files. 
TurboScan uses advanced fast algorithms to auto-detect document edges, straighten the documents (correct perspective), eliminate shadows and set a perfect contrast.

TurboScan boasts a powerful yet easy to use interface. Get instant one-tap brightness, rotation and color controls all on one screen!

TurboScan also offers SureScan, our proprietary scanning mode for sharper scans (especially useful in low-light conditions.) SureScan requires taking three pictures of the same document with the phone camera.

TurboScan's handy "Email to myself" feature lets you send documents to a predefined address, or even upload them to online storage sites like Evernote, with a single tap.

All processing happens on your phone, and the confidentiality of your data is never compromised (no Internet connection needed.)

TURBOSCAN FEATURES:
â€¢ Automatic document edge detection and perspective correction
â€¢ SureScan mode for very sharp scans
â€¢ Ultra-fast processing (under 3 seconds per page)
â€¢ Document naming, storage inside the app and search
â€¢ Multipage editing: add, reorder, and delete pages
â€¢ Copy pages between stored scans
â€¢ â€œEmail to myselfâ€ feature for quick emails
â€¢ Email document as PDF, JPEG or PNG, or save to camera roll
â€¢ Arrange multiple receipts or business cards on a PDF page
â€¢ Open PDFs or JPEGs in other apps like the free Dropbox app (or Evernote, SkyDrive, GoogleDrive app, etc) to send to clouds, or fax apps
â€¢ Printing via Cloud Print or other print apps
â€¢ Instant one-tap brightness, rotation, and color controls
â€¢ Compact attachments with adjustable size

TIPS ON SCANNING
â€¢ Make sure your document is flat and well lit.
â€¢ For best edge detection, include some margin around your document while shooting.
â€¢ Use flash in low light conditions, but avoid glare from it with glossy documents.
â€¢ If your flash over-saturates images or makes them blurry, please change the flash option in app
